Articles.Content:
I moved kerbals over from one spacecraft to another and all of a sudden my SAS wouldn't turn on. I have a pilot on board and a it still wouldn't turn on. now I can't toggle SAS for any of my crafts and after 10 minutes RCS stops working. I checked and the keys work fine for everything else. Does anyone know what is happening?

Edited April 3, 2016 by Zaccy200
Are you using Mechjeb? Did you leave the SmartASS on? If not, can you tell us your mod list? Try also to upload a screenshot. It's hard to tell anything without it.
